translation.en: I know you two became very close very quickly,
translation.vi: I know you two became very close very quickly,

translation.en: if you'd be willing.
translation.vi: if you'd be willing.

translation.en: Whatever the department needs.
translation.vi: Whatever the department needs.

translation.en: I have some very sad news to report.
translation.vi: I have some very sad news to report.

translation.en: Some of you may have already heard.
translation.vi: Some of you may have already heard.

translation.en: Is this some kind of joke?
translation.vi: Is this some kind of joke?

translation.en: Did you cancel your class?
translation.vi: Did you cancel your class?

translation.en: You skipped your protein shake again.
translation.vi: You skipped your protein shake again.

translation.en: We can sit down, have that chat you've been pushing for.
translation.vi: We can sit down, have that chat you've been pushing for.

translation.en: Where do you think you're going?
translation.vi: Where do you think you're going?

translation.en: With my goddamn daughter!
translation.vi: With my goddamn daughter!

translation.en: Your clothes were soaked that night! And Justine? You hated her.
translation.vi: Your clothes were soaked that night! And Justine? You hated her.

translation.en: Go. Get up. Leave your daughter with this, this monster you've conjured up
translation.vi: Go. Get up. Leave your daughter with this, this monster you've conjured up

translation.en: [Ella] …I can gather sharp stones
translation.vi: [Ella] …I can gather sharp stones

translation.en: so you don't feel their pain.
translation.vi: so you don't feel their pain.

translation.en: Where did he put you?
translation.vi: Where did he put you?

translation.en: for the power to stop this.
translation.vi: for the power to stop this.

translation.en: [male ghostly voice] No.
translation.vi: [male ghostly voice] No.

translation.en: -[male ghostly voice] Stop this! -[Ella] No!
translation.vi: -[male ghostly voice] Stop this! -[Ella] No!

translation.en: I got my neighbor here, you know, the college professor.
translation.vi: I got my neighbor here, you know, the college professor.

translation.en: She was discovered by her husband, Saginaw professor…
translation.vi: She was discovered by her husband, Saginaw professor…

translation.en: -I should have done something. -[Eddie] Okay.
translation.vi: -I should have done something. -[Eddie] Okay.

translation.en: They can't force us to come back tomorrow.
translation.vi: They can't force us to come back tomorrow.

translation.en: That doesn't mean that they'd put an ax in their gut.
translation.vi: That doesn't mean that they'd put an ax in their gut.

translation.en: Or maybe she was cheating on him.
translation.vi: Or maybe she was cheating on him.

translation.en: I never said I don't, son, but you're giving me nothing here.
translation.vi: I never said I don't, son, but you're giving me nothing here.

translation.en: Took the art department out for drinks,
translation.vi: Took the art department out for drinks,

translation.en: even had the babysitter come.
translation.vi: even had the babysitter come.

translation.en: But you said he could have done it earlier.
translation.vi: But you said he could have done it earlier.

translation.en: The coroner confirmed as much.
translation.vi: The coroner confirmed as much.

translation.en: -You have to arrest him. -I know.
translation.vi: -You have to arrest him. -I know.

translation.en: [voice 3] Goodness always triumphs.
translation.vi: [voice 3] Goodness always triumphs.

translation.en: Someone claiming to be an old friend.
translation.vi: Someone claiming to be an old friend.

translation.en: Trust in your impulses.
translation.vi: Trust in your impulses.

translation.en: Mind just giving me a hand?
translation.vi: Mind just giving me a hand?

translation.en: [Ella and Catherine] Damned. Damned.
translation.vi: [Ella and Catherine] Damned. Damned.

translation.en: …from tiny drops…
translation.vi: …from tiny drops…
